name: Greens Garments
overview:
Greens Garments was incorporated in the year 1998 and created a distinct identity by manufacturing and supplying a finely stitched range of Women’s Shorts, Women’s Polo T-Shirts, Women’s Leggings, Ladies Innerwear, Men’s Full Sleeve T-Shirts, Women’s Nightwear, Men’s Innerwear, Men’s T-Shirts, Ladies Pyjamas, Men’s Wear, Women’s Tops, Women’s Tank Tops and Men’s Polo T-Shirts.

Infrastructure: Our infrastructural capability and strength has given us an edge against our competitors. Our unit has capacity to produce in bulk and to serve the customers in an efficient manner. Our infrastructure exhibits world-class outlook and enable us to meet our targets in promised time-period. Besides, we regularly upgrade our machines, so that we can keep pace with the dynamic business environment.

Our Quality: We primarily focus on maintain prescribed quality standards in our product range, hence leave no stone unturned in achieving the same. Comprehensive quality control policies are formulated by us, in order to achieve our target. Quality analysts working with us stringently examine, each and every stage, so that even 0% of flaws are not noticed in final range. Fabric used in manufacturing of our range is sourced from certified and reliable vendors.

Client Satisfaction: Satisfying the customer’s demands in an appropriate manner is the first and foremost aim of our organization. Products made from high quality fabrics are delivered to the clients. We also offer the facility of customization, our expert’s tailor-made the products as per the details given by the clients. We never ignore the quality standards prescribed by concerned authorities and carry the production accordingly.

Why Us?: Serving the customers in most desirable manner and by meeting our promises, we have been able to carve a distinct niche in industry. Our progressive approach has helped us to meet the targets in minimum time period.
